Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Remover = script:WaitForChild("Remover")
Equipped = false
MaxRange = 50
Damage = 5 ReloadTime = 0.01
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
BasePart = Instance.new("Part") BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.SmoothPlastic BasePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom BasePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) BasePart.Anchored = true BasePart.CanCollide = false BasePart.Locked = true
Laser = BasePart:Clone() Laser.Name = "Laser" Laser.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red") Laser.Transparency = 0.25 Laser.Reflectance = 0.25 LaserMesh = Instance.new("CylinderMesh") LaserMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.25, 1, 0.25) LaserMesh.Parent = Laser
Blotch = BasePart:Clone() Blotch.Name = "InkBlotch" Blotch.Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.2, 1) BlotchMesh = Instance.new("CylinderMesh") BlotchMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.25, 0.25, 0.25) BlotchMesh.Parent = Blotch
Tool.Enabled = true
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if player ~= Player or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Tool.Enabled then return end if Mode == "Click" and Value.Down then Tool.Enabled = false local Mouse = Value.Mouse
if LaserModel and LaserModel.Parent then for i, v in pairs(LaserModel:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") and v.Name == "Laser" then v:Destroy() end end end
local OffsetRadius = 10 local RandomizedOffset = (Vector3.new(math.random(-OffsetRadius, OffsetRadius), math.random(-OffsetRadius, OffsetRadius), math.random(-OffsetRadius, OffsetRadius)) * 0.1) local TargetPoint = (Mouse.Hit + RandomizedOffset)
local BlackLaserStartingPosition = PositionProjectile(Handle, 0, -0.25, 0) BlackLaserStartingPosition = BlackLaserStartingPosition + Handle.CFrame.lookVector * (Handle.Size.Z / 2) local BlackLaserHit, BlackLaserPos = CastRay(BlackLaserStartingPosition.p, TargetPoint, "Really black") LaserHit(BlackLaserHit, BlackLaserPos, "Really black")
local WhiteLaserStartingPosition = PositionProjectile(Handle, 0, -0.5, 0) WhiteLaserStartingPosition = WhiteLaserStartingPosition + Handle.CFrame.lookVector * (Handle.Size.Z / 2) local WhiteLaserHit, WhiteLaserPos = CastRay(WhiteLaserStartingPosition.p, (TargetPoint + (Handle.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, math.pi/2)).lookVector * 0.5), "Institutional white") LaserHit(WhiteLaserHit, WhiteLaserPos, "Institutional white")
-- wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end end)
function LaserHit(Hit, Position, Color) if not Hit or not LaserModel or not LaserModel.Parent then return end local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit) if not humanoid then CreateInkBlotch(Hit, Position, Color) elseif humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then Hit.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(Color) for i, v in pairs(Hit:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("DataModelMesh") then if v:IsA("FileMesh") then v.TextureId = "" end local RGBColor = BrickColor.new(Color).Color v.VertexColor = Vector3.new((RGBColor.r), (RGBColor.g), (RGBColor.b)) end for i, v in pairs(Hit.Parent:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Clothing") then v:Destroy() end end end UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) end end
function Round(Number, Round_Decimal) local Whole_Number, Decimal = math.modf(Number) return ((Decimal >= Round_Decimal and math.ceil(Number)) or (Decimal < Round_Decimal and math.floor(Number))) end
function PartToTerrain(Part, Position, GridOffset, RoundInterval) local PartCFrame = CFrame.new(Position) local PX, PY, PZ = PartCFrame.X, PartCFrame.Y, PartCFrame.Z local PXToGrid = (Round((PX / GridOffset), RoundInterval) * GridOffset) local PYToGrid = (Round((PY / GridOffset), RoundInterval) * GridOffset) local PZToGrid = (Round((PZ / GridOffset), RoundInterval) * GridOffset) local RandomX, RandomY, RandomZ = math.random(1, 2), math.random(1, 2), math.random(1, 2) RandomX = ((RandomX == 1 and -2) or (RandomX == 2 and 2)) RandomY = ((RandomY == 1 and -2) or (RandomY == 2 and 2)) RandomZ = ((RandomZ == 1 and -2) or (RandomZ == 2 and 2)) PXToGrid = ((PXToGrid > PX and (PXToGrid - 2)) or (PXToGrid < PX and (PXToGrid + 2)) or (PXToGrid + RandomX)) PYToGrid = ((PYToGrid > PY and (PYToGrid - 2)) or (PYToGrid < PY and (PYToGrid + 2)) or (PYToGrid + RandomY)) PZToGrid = ((PZToGrid > PZ and (PZToGrid - 2)) or (PZToGrid < PZ and (PZToGrid + 2)) or (PZToGrid + RandomZ)) PX = ((((PX + 2) % GridOffset ~= 0) and PXToGrid) or PX) PY = ((((PY + 2) % GridOffset ~= 0) and PYToGrid) or PY) PZ = ((((PZ + 2) % GridOffset ~= 0) and PZToGrid) or PZ) Part.CFrame = CFrame.new(PX, PY, PZ) end
function GetNormalId(Part, Hit) if Part:IsA("Terrain") then local Terrain = game:GetService("Workspace").Terrain local HitTerrain = (Vector3.new(Round(Hit.X, 0.5), Round(Hit.Y, 0.5), Round(Hit.Z, 0.5)) * 4) local CellPosition = Terrain:WorldToCell(HitTerrain) local FakePart = BasePart:Clone() FakePart.Size = Vector3.new(4, 4, 4) PartToTerrain(FakePart, Hit, 4, 0.5) Part = FakePart end local Point = Part.CFrame:pointToObjectSpace(Hit) local Size = (Part.Size / 2) if math.abs(Point.X - Size.X) < 0.01 then return Enum.NormalId.Right elseif math.abs(Point.X + Size.X) < 0.01 then return Enum.NormalId.Left elseif math.abs(Point.Y - Size.Y) < 0.01 then return Enum.NormalId.Top elseif math.abs(Point.Y + Size.Y) < 0.01 then return Enum.NormalId.Bottom elseif math.abs(Point.Z - Size.Z) < 0.01 then return Enum.NormalId.Back elseif math.abs(Point.Z + Size.Z) < 0.01 then return Enum.NormalId.Front else return Enum.NormalId.Front end end
function CreateInkBlotch(Hit, Position, Color) local Surface = GetNormalId(Hit, Position) local Surfaces = { Left = CFrame.Angles(0, 0, (math.pi / 2)), Right = CFrame.Angles(math.pi, 0, -(math.pi / 2)), Front = CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 2), 0, 0), Back = CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, 0), Top = CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0), Bottom = CFrame.Angles(math.pi, 0, 0) } local BlotchClone = Blotch:Clone() BlotchClone.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(Color) Debris:AddItem(BlotchClone, 5) BlotchClone.Parent = LaserModel BlotchClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(Position) BlotchClone.CFrame = BlotchClone.CFrame * Surfaces[Surface.Name] local YLookVector = (BlotchClone.CFrame * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, 0)).lookVector BlotchClone.CFrame = BlotchClone.CFrame + YLookVector * ((BlotchClone.Size.Y / 2) - 0.075) end
function RayCast(Position, Direction, MaxDistance, IgnoreList) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Position, Direction.unit * (MaxDistance or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) pcall(function() ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function PositionProjectile(handle, x, y, z) local HandleClone = handle:Clone() local HandleCloneY = HandleClone:Clone() HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0) HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame - HandleCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * y local HandleCloneZ = HandleCloneY:Clone() HandleCloneZ.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame + HandleClone.CFrame.lookVector * z local HandleCloneX = HandleCloneZ:Clone() HandleCloneX.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(90), 0) HandleCloneX.CFrame = HandleCloneX.CFrame - HandleCloneX.CFrame.lookVector * x return HandleCloneX.CFrame end
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) pcall(function() ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) end
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function CastRay(StartingPosition, EndPosition, Color) local Direction = CFrame.new(StartingPosition, EndPosition).lookVector local Hit, Pos = RayCast(StartingPosition, Direction, MaxRange, {Character, LaserModel}) local RayLength = (StartingPosition - Pos).magnitude if not Hit and (StartingPosition - EndPosition).magnitude < MaxRange then RayLength = (StartingPosition - EndPosition).magnitude end local LaserClone = Laser:Clone() LaserClone.BrickColor = BrickColor.new(Color) LaserClone.Size = Vector3.new(LaserClone.Size.X, RayLength, LaserClone.Size.Z) if not LaserModel or not LaserModel.Parent or LaserModel.Name ~= "LaserModel" then if LaserModel and LaserModel.Parent then LaserModel:Destroy() end LaserModel = Instance.new("Model") LaserModel.Name = "LaserModel" RemoverClone = Remover:Clone() RemoverClone.Disabled = false RemoverClone.Parent = LaserModel end Debris:AddItem(LaserClone, 5) InvokeClient("SetTargetFilter", LaserModel) LaserClone.Parent = LaserModel if not LaserModel.Parent then LaserModel.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") end Spawn(function() if LaserClone and LaserClone.Parent then for i = 1, 100 do if LaserClone and LaserClone.Parent then if LaserClone.Transparency >= 1 then break end LaserClone.Transparency = LaserClone.Transparency + 0.025 end wait(0.001) end if LaserClone and LaserClone.Parent then LaserClone:Destroy() end end end) LaserClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(StartingPosition) + Direction * (RayLength / 2) LaserClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(LaserClone.Position, Pos) * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, 0) return Hit, Pos end
function Equipped() Equipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Model = script.Parent
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function GetLasers() local Lasers = {} for i, v in pairs(Model:GetChildren()) do if v and v.Parent and v:IsA("BasePart") and (v.Name == "Laser" or v.Name == "InkBlotch") then table.insert(Lasers, v) end end return Lasers end
function DestroyModel() Model.Name = ("Removing" .. Model.Name) if Model and Model.Parent then Model:Destroy() end Debris:AddItem(Model, 2) end
if #GetLasers() == 0 then DestroyModel() else Model.ChildRemoved:connect(function() if #GetLasers() == 0 then DestroyModel() end end) end

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
Equipped = false MouseDown = false
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if Mode == "SetTargetFilter" and Value then TargetFilter = Value end end)
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) pcall(function() ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) end) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Equipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if MouseDown then return end MouseDown = true Spawn(function() while MouseDown do InvokeServer("Click", {Down = true, Mouse = {Hit = Mouse.Hit.p}}) Mouse.TargetFilter = TargetFilter wait(0.01) end end) end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() MouseDown = false end) end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false MouseDown = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
